text: The 2060s is a decade in the Anno Domini and Common Era in the Gregorian calendar. It will begin on January 1, 2060 and end on December 31, 2069. It is distinct from the decade known as the 207th decade which began on January 1, 2061 and ended on December 31, 2070. ==Notable predictions and known events== * In 2060, one-third of all the energy in the world is predicted to be solar. * In 2061, Halley's Comet will get as close as it can to the Sun. This is known as a perihelion, and it last happened in 1986. ==Events in fiction== * The television anime show Real Drive takes place in this decade. ==References== Category:2060s
title: 2060s
